data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stadion have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Jo Inge Berget of Malmo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Orebro goal kick.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Orebro at Stadion.
Throw-in high up the field for Malmo in Malmo.
Goal kick for Orebro at Stadion.
In the minute 5, Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Orebro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 7, Malmo are pushing forward but Arnor Traustason's finish is wide of the goal.
Victor Wolf awards Orebro a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
In the minute 11, Arnor Traustason of Malmo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 13, Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Orebro.
Malmo have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Orebro needs to be cautious. Malmo have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Malmo.
Throw-in for Malmo in the half of Orebro.
In the minute 17, In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Malmo are coming forward and Arnor Traustason gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Orebro at Stadion.
In the minute 22, Can Orebro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Malmo's half?
Malmo advance rapidly upfield but Victor Wolf blows for offside.
Orebro's Jake Larsson is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 25, Amin Sarr (Malmo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Orebro.
In the minute 26, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
Free kick for Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 27, Jake Larsson scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Ali Hussein.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
In the minute 29, Malmo attack but Jo Inge Berget's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Malmo.
Malmo's Amin Sarr gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 30, Orebro have a goal kick.
Amin Sarr for Malmo is whistled offside.
Free kick for Malmo in the half of Orebro.
In the minute 32, Johan Martensson (Orebro) gets a yellow card.
Malmo's Franz Brorsson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Orebro defender.
Victor Wolf signals a Malmo throw-in in Orebro's half.
In the minute 34, Malmo to take a throw-in in Orebro territory.
Malmo have a dangerous throw-in.
Malmo drive upfield and Ola Toivonen gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Orebro defender.
In the minute 36, Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Malmo's Arnor Traustason misses with an attempt on goal.
Victor Wolf awards Orebro a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Orebro in their own half.
Throw-in for Malmo at Stadion.
In the minute 39, Nahir Besara for Orebro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
Orebro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Can Malmo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orebro's half?
Throw-in for Malmo close to the penalty box.
Victor Wolf awards Orebro a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victor Wolf signals a throw-in for Malmo, close to Orebro's area.
Erdal Rakip levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 44, Ola Toivonen instrumental with a fine assist.
Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Malmo in Malmo.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Orebro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stadion.
Throw-in for Orebro in their own half.
Victor Wolf blows against Orebro's Ali Hussein for offside.
In the minute 48, Orebro's Nahir Besara gets in a shot on goal at Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Malmo's Ola Toivonen goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Orebro.
Malmo's Ola Toivonen breaks free at Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Orebro have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orebro's half?
Important block from the Orebro defence as Amin Sarr fires in a strike for Malmo.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
In the minute 52, Erdal Rakip (Malmo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
In Malmo, Jo Inge Berget (Malmo) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Orebro at Stadion.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Erdal Rakip (Malmo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 55, Malmo are pushing forward but Amin Sarr's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Malmo.
Orebro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Victor Wolf signals a Orebro throw-in in Malmo's half.
Orebro to take a throw-in in Malmo territory.
Throw-in for Malmo in the half of Orebro.
In the minute 61, Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Orebro in their own half.
Free kick for Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 62, Jon Dahl Tomasson (Malmo) is making a first substitution, with Soren Rieks replacing Arnor Traustason.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Orebro.
Adi Nalic is on a sub for Amin Sarr for Malmo.
In the minute 64, Jake Larsson (Orebro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Malmo at Stadion.
In the minute 65, Throw-in Orebro.
Throw-in Malmo.
Orebro make their first substitution with Albin Granlund replacing Ali Hussein.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 67, Orebro drives forward and Nahir Besara gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Orebro close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 68, Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Malmo at Stadion.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Free kick Malmo.
Malmo's Erdal Rakip misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Orebro goal kick.
In the minute 71, Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Adi Nalic.
Great play from Jo Inge Berget to set up the goal.
In the minute 73, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
Malmo push forward at Stadion and Ola Toivonen gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Orebro defence.
Free kick for Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 75, Franz Brorsson (Malmo) has received a yellow card from Victor Wolf.
Axel Kjall is making the team's second substitution at Stadion with Dennis Collander replacing Johan Martensson.
The away team replace Michael Almeback with Kevin Wright.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Malmo in the half of Orebro.
Malmo have a goal kick.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 81, Robin Book is replacing Agon Mehmeti for the away team.
In Malmo Malmo attack through Jo Inge Berget. The finish is off target, however.
Victor Wolf awards Orebro a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Malmo.
In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Malmo to take a throw-in in Orebro territory.
In the minute 84, In Malmo Malmo drive forward through Ola Toivonen. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Nahir Besara (Orebro) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick Malmo.
In the minute 85, Orebro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Victor Wolf signals a Malmo throw-in in Orebro's half.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
In the minute 87, In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Malmo.
Ball safe as Orebro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Malmo.
Free kick for Orebro in the half of Malmo.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Can Malmo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Orebro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Orebro at Stadion.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
